title: A python guide to web scraping
description: Everything you need to know to get started on your feet with Python Web Scraping, using the BS4 modules.

title: Powershell course for pentesters
description: An in-depth tutorial about the usage of powershell for pentesting purposes.

title: Wireless Hacking for beginners
description: Learn the basics of wireless pentesting with this guide.

title: Free programming E-Books
description: Check out these awesome free e-books covering a wide variety of Computer Science topics. There are about 50 e-books worth of programming and scripting knowledge, written by professionals.

title: Responsive Youtube iFrames
description: Atleast once in your life you'll want to embed a youtube video or a youtube playlist on a webpage. You will soon notice that something feels off with the embedded iFrame. That's right, there's no direct way to make it responsive. Your iFrame will look wonky and wrong sometimes, especially on mobile. In this article you will learn how to fix this problem by using a css workaround

title: Fuzzing 101
description: A repository with exercises to help you practice and learn about fuzzing, with 10 real targets.

title: LFI & RFI: A comprehensive guide
description: Learn the basics and not-so-basic aspects of LFI and RFI vulnerabilities in this detailed guide.

title: FFMPEG - Merge audio and video from different video sources
description: Say you have two videos, V1 and V2. I found myself in situations where i want the audio source from V1 and the video source from V2, or viceversa. It was quite a pain to get the output video as i desired, so here's (probably) the best explaination out there on how to do it.
